name: Andrzej Tarlecki
content: Andrzej Tarlecki Andrzej Tarlecki Institute of Informatics Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics University of Warsaw ul. Banacha 2, 02-097 Warsaw, Poland office: 4750 email: tarleckimimuw.edu.pl phone: +48 22 55 44 475 (If you want you can see me) With all the due apologies: everything below and above is under development. Some links may be missing. Most text is missing. No real info is included! This will change eventually, one hopes... Please, support: Witold Lipski Prize for Young Researchers in Computer Science My involvement in journal editorial boards (not all current anymore): Information Processing Letters (IPL) (IPL's submission page) Fundamenta Informaticae Logical Methods in Computer Science (LMCS) Electronic Communications of the EASST Categories and General Algebraic Structures with Applications (CGASA) SN Computer Science (SN-CS) Submit your best papers there! From here you can reach further information about my: Affiliations and addresses Bibliography: list of publications a book on Foundations of Algebraic Specification and Formal Software Development My brief CV (or a longer version, if you really need it) Teaching Talks (only very recent) Professional organizations Informatics Section of Academia Europea IFIP groups and committees: WG 2.2 "Formal Description of Programming Concepts" WG 1.3 "Foundations of System Specification" TC 1 "Foundations of Computer Science" Some further links (partially recovered) Dining in Warsaw (written for the participants of ETAPS'03), and an occasionally growing addendum Some restaurants (Poland, mostly Warsaw, but not only) AT
